name: Sai Gon By Night & Foody Tour
description: There is no better way to enjoy nightlife in Sai Gon than by scooter! Sai Gon is interesting enough during the day but it takes on a whole new form come night fall. Sai Gon at night is a truly beautiful sight! And its all the more beautiful to first time visitors. There is so much to see, do and taste, that we can't even begin to write a list! Sai Gon is a city that never sleeps. An army marches on its stomach and so to do Sai Gon.
